AT.name: Governor of Poker
AT.description: In der glühend heißen Stadt San Saba beginnt deine Reise um der Poker Meister im umlimativen Texas Hold'em Up Pokerturnier zu werden. Schaffe dir einen Namen und werde immer wohlhabender um irgendwann ganz Texas übernehmen zu können. Streife durch über 10 raue Städte und nimm teil an unzähligen Poker Turnieren, Geldspielen die in Saloons stattfinden und kaufe unschätzbare Grundstücke auf! Mach anderen Texanern die Hölle heiß und besiege sie in Turnieren als der Big-Stack-Bully! Die Einsätze sind hoch also spiele deine Karten richtig und werde zum einziegen Meister des Pokers unter dem Himmel des Westens. - 2 Spielmodi für schnelle Pokerrunden oder um den Titel des Poker Meisters - Nimm Schutz vor der glühenden Hitze des Westens in Saloons und nimm teil an Geldspielen um Geld für Transportmöglichkeiten und Immobilien zu gewinnen! - Herrsche über alle 13 Städte und werde zum Meister des Pokers! - Hole dir alle 24 Preise und fege die Konkurrenz vom Pokertisch!

BG.name: Governor of Poker
BG.description: In the scorching town of San Saba begins your journey to becoming the new Governor of Poker in the ultimate Texas Hold’em Up poker tournament. Build your reputation and riches up to take over the whole state of Texas. Stroll through over 10 rustic towns and enter numerous saloons to compete in poker tournaments and cash games to win big and buy up priceless real estate! Blow up some steam and bring fellow Texans to their knees as they bust from tournaments with you crowned as Big Stack Bully! The stakes are high so play your cards right and grow your wealth to become the one and only Governor of Poker. - 2 modes of game play for either quick rounds of poker or dealing your hand for the title of Governor - Escape the sweltering heat of the old Wild West and enter saloons for tournaments and cash games to win cash, transport and real estate! - Claim over 10 Texan towns and build your reputation as the Governor of Poker! - Bust out players and your best poker face to claim all 24 rewards!

BE.name: Governor of Poker
BE.description: L'aventure débute dans la ville torride de San Saba et ton but est de devenir le Governor of Poker, grand vainqueur de l'ultime tournoi de Texas Hold'em. Promène-toi dans plus de 10 villes et entre dans de nombreux Saloons pour y participer à des tournois de poker et à des cash games, gagner gros et acheter des biens immobiliers inestimables! Fais s'agenouiller devant toi les citoyens Texans éliminés des tables de poker où tu règneras en tant que Chipleader! Les paris sont élevés donc joue bien tes cartes et grossis ton pactole pour devenir le seul et l'unique Governor of Poker. - 2 modes de jeu pour faire des parties de poker rapides ou stratégiques - Echappe à la chaleur torride du Far West et entre dans les saloons pour faire des tournois et des cash games pour gagner: de l'argent, un moyen de transport et des biens immobiliers! - 13 villes à conquérir, une réputation de Governor à construire! - Élimine tes adversaires en restant impassible dans ton jeu et obtiens les 24 récompenses!

ES.name: Governor of Poker
ES.description: En la abrasadora ciudad de San Saba comienza tu viaje para convertirte en el nuevo Gobernador del Póquer. ¡Crea tu reputación en el torneo definitivo de Texas Hold'em y enriquécete hasta conquistar el estado de Texas! Hay más de 10 ciudades con numerosos salones donde jugar torneos de póquer, apostar, ganar a lo grande y comprar inmuebles de incalculable valor. Pon a prueba tu coraje y despluma a los texanos. Arruínalos y corónate como el Capitán de la Mesa. Hay mucho en juego así que juega bien tus cartas para convertirte en el único Gobernador del Póquer. - 2 modos de juego, tanto en partidas rápidas como en la lucha por el título de Gobernador. - ¡Escapa del sofocante calor del Lejano Oeste entrando en los salones! ¡Juega torneos, apuesta, gana dinero, medios de transporte y bienes inmuebles! - ¡Reivindícate a lo largo de las 13 ciudades y crea tu reputación como Gobernador del Póquer! - ¡Despluma a otros jugadores con tu cara de póquer y consigue los 24 premios!

IT.name: Governor of Poker
IT.description: San Saba, rovente e desolata cittadina del West: è da qui che comincia il tuo viaggio per diventare Governor of Poker, in un torneo di Texas Hold’em Up all’ultima carta. Fatti rispettare e accumula denaro, fino a impossessarti di tutto il Texas. Avventurati per queste cittadine desolate ed entra nei saloon per partecipare ai tornei di poker, fare il colpo grosso e acquistare immobili! Fa’ fumare la tua pistola e elimina chi osa sfidare te, lo Spaccone fortunato! La posta in gioco è alta: gioca bene le tue carte e aumenta il tuo patrimonio per diventare l’unico e inimitabile Governor of Poker. - 2 modalità di gioco per ogni mano veloce o deal. - Sfuggi alla calura soffocante del Selvaggio West e entra nei saloon per partecipare ai tornei e vincere denaro e proprietà immobiliari! - Costruisci la tua reputazione di Governor of Poker e fatti rispettare in tutte le 13 cittadine del gioco! - Elimina gli avversarsi e ottieni tutti i 24 premi grazie alla tua faccia tosta!

NL.name: Governor of Poker
NL.description: In de verzengende hitte van San Saba begint jouw reis naar de titel van Governor of Poker in het ultieme Texas Hold’em Up-pokertornooi. Bouw je reputatie en rijkdom op om de staat Texas over te nemen. Wandel door meer dan 10 dorpjes en ga tal van cafés binnen om mee te doen aan pokertornooien en geldspelletjes, win handenvol geld en koop waardevol vastgoed! Zet je tegenstanders op het verkeerde been en speel hen uit het tornooi terwijl jij gekroond wordt tot Big Stack Bully! De inzet is torenhoog dus speel het slim en verzamel geld om de enige echte Governor of Poker te worden. - 2 speelmodi: snelle ronde of een hand voor de titel van Governor - Ontsnap aan de verstikkende hitte van het oude Wilde Westen en ga cafés binnen om tornooien en geldspelletjes te spelen, en win geld, transport en vastgoed! - Word meester van de 13 dorpen en bouw je reputatie op als Governor of Poker! - Zet je beste pokerface voor en versla spelers om de 24 prijzen in de wacht te slepen!

The stakes are high so play your cards right and grow your wealth to become the one and only Governor of Poker. - 2 modes of game play for either quick rounds of poker or dealing your hand for the title of Governor - Escape the sweltering heat of the old Wild West and enter saloons for tournaments and cash games to win cash, transport and real estate! - Claim over 10 Texan towns and build your reputation as the Governor of Poker! - Bust out players and your best poker face to claim all 24 rewards!

ZA.name: Governor of Poker
ZA.description: In the scorching town of San Saba begins your journey to becoming the new Governor of Poker in the ultimate Texas Hold’em Up poker tournament. Build your reputation and riches up to take over the whole state of Texas. Stroll through over 10 rustic towns and enter numerous saloons to compete in poker tournaments and cash games to win big and buy up priceless real estate! Blow up some steam and bring fellow Texans to their knees as they bust from tournaments with you crowned as Big Stack Bully! The stakes are high so play your cards right and grow your wealth to become the one and only Governor of Poker. - 2 modes of game play for either quick rounds of poker or dealing your hand for the title of Governor - Escape the sweltering heat of the old Wild West and enter saloons for tournaments and cash games to win cash, transport and real estate! - Claim over 10 Texan towns and build your reputation as the Governor of Poker! - Bust out players and your best poker face to claim all 24 rewards!
